## OPLStake class

Represents a user's OPL stake and accrued gains.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class OPLStake 
```

## Remarks

Returned by the [getOPLStake()](./lib-base.readableliquity.getoplstake.md) function.

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `OPLStake` class.

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [collateralGain](./lib-base.oplstake.collateralgain.md) |  | [Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md) | Collateral gain available to withdraw. |
|  [isEmpty](./lib-base.oplstake.isempty.md) |  | boolean |  |
|  [lusdGain](./lib-base.oplstake.lusdgain.md) |  | [Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md) | ONEU gain available to withdraw. |
|  [stakedOPL](./lib-base.oplstake.stakedopl.md) |  | [Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md) | The amount of OPL that's staked. |
